CommonFields.Title: Dynamic mechanical behavior of in situ functionalized multi-walled carbon nanotube/phenoxy resin composite
Author: Goh, H.W
Goh, S.H
Xu, G.Q
Pramoda, K.P
Zhang, W.D
CommonFields.Location: Department of Chemistry, National University of Singapore, 3 Science Drive 3, Singapore 117543, Singapore

Heating.Description: about 100 mg of the catalyst was placed in a quartz tube mounted in a tube furnace

ChooseParameter.Other: Then, the pressure was released and reapplied three times to remove any residual air bubbles within the composite.

Dynamic_Mechanical_Analysis.Description: Dynamic mechanical analysis (DMA) was performed in nitrogen, flowing at a rate of 40 ml/min. All runs were performed using a fre- quency of 1 Hz and a heating rate of 3 °C/min.

XRay_Photoelectron_Spectroscopy.Equipment: VG Scientific ESCALAB MkII X-ray source
XRay_Photoelectron_Spectroscopy.Description: The X-ray source was run at 12kV and 10mA. Apassenergyof20eVanda rate of 0.05 eV/step were used for all the high resolution XPS spectra acquisition with a binding energy width of 12 eV. The pressure in the analysis chamber was maintained at 10^-8 mbar or lower during measurements. All spectra were curve-fitted with XPSPEAK3.1 software.
